directions: Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet; cook and stir garlic and jalapeno in hot skillet until softened, about 5 minutes. Add zucchini, yellow bell pepper, red bell pepper, and shallot; continue to cook and stir until tender, about 5 minutes more. Season with salt, pepper, and paprika.
ingredients: 1 jalapeno pepper, seeds and ribs removed, minced
1 yellow bell pepper, cut into chunks
1 red bell pepper, cut into chunks
freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Garlic Vegetable Saute
